definition: to plan to/to draft (a plan)/to imitate/to assess/to compare/pseudo-
doubtful/suspicious/variant of 擬|拟[ni3]/to emulate/to imitate

sentences.english: These readings are obtained from a Japanese magnetosphere simulator.
sentences.chinese: 这些读数来源于“日本磁气圈模拟器”。

sentences.english: I would also like to avoid having to launch the Blackberry simulator if possible.
sentences.chinese: 我也想避免如果可能推出黑莓手机模拟器。

sentences.english: The first thing we need to do is create a simulator configuration file.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要做的第一件事情就是创建模拟器配置文件。

sentences.english: Company representatives will also provide a spacecraft/observatory simulator.
sentences.chinese: 该公司还将提供空间段和地面观察站的模拟器。

sentences.english: The advantages and importance of on-ground flight simulator has been constantly concerned about.
sentences.chinese: 地面飞行模拟器的作用和重要性经常受到人们的重视。

sentences.english: An adaptive backstepping control method on electro-hydraulic loading simulator is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了电液负载模拟器的自适应反演控制策略。

sentences.english: Modern advanced solar simulators adopt pulse xenon lamps, domestically and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 目前，国内外较先进的太阳模拟器均采用了脉冲氙灯。

sentences.english: The relationship between flight simulator fidelity and flight test is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了飞行模拟器逼真度与飞行试验的关系。

sentences.english: The framework supports the use of both a simulator and a dashboard for unit testing services. The simulator framework consists of the following defined layers
sentences.chinese: 该框架支持使用模拟器和指示板进行单元测试。

sentences.english: In my opinion the best tools to analyse such binaries are Interactive Disassemblers or CPU emulators .
sentences.chinese: 在我看来是交互式反汇编器或CPU模拟器。

sentences.english: In the simulations you will be using a modified mil dot reticle .
sentences.chinese: 在模拟器里你会使用到改良的密位点十字线。

sentences.english: Currently, the only way to capture screenshots is through the WP7 emulator.
sentences.chinese: 目前，只有这样才能捕捉截图通过涡喷7的模拟器。

sentences.english: There is also an evaluation edition that allows you deploy to the simulator only.
sentences.chinese: 还有一个评估版本，你只能把应用部署到模拟器中。

sentences.english: Now, enter the professional racing simulator, " says Frank Kalff, Cruden's commercial director.
sentences.chinese: 现在，是时候进入专业的赛车模拟器领域了。

sentences.english: In the second chapters, describes the system design of the ACSS.
sentences.chinese: 第二章介绍了伺服模拟器的总体设计。

sentences.english: You can observe and analyze this activity in the Simulator Client.
sentences.chinese: 可以在模拟器客户机中观察和分析这一活动。

definition: online/network/to connect online/to connect an electronic device to another device
plug-in (software or hardware)/to plug in a component
main engine/(military) lead aircraft/(computing) host computer/main processor/server
